snippet: GINDEL--Rose. September 30, 1928 - February 20, 2016. She is survived by her husband Alvin of 65 years and her sons Michael (wife Margaret) and Brent. She was a kind and loving person who was also the most wonderful and beautiful woman, we love her and she will be missed forever. 1/3
lead_paragraph: GINDEL--Rose. September 30, 1928 - February 20, 2016. She is survived by her husband Alvin of 65 years and her sons Michael (wife Margaret) and Brent. She was a kind and loving person who was also the most wonderful and beautiful woman, we love her and she will be missed forever. 1/3
